content: No need to imagine. Step into the Memory Care Ward I work at. Fourteen souls with mid to advanced stage Alzheimer’s wander about… looking for their home, their car, their mother or husband. I pass one in the hall… “Hello… I’m looking for my husband, Paul Smith. Have you seen him?” After telling her he’s at work, she continues on. Five minutes later she passes by again. “Hello… I’m looking for my husband, Paul Smith. Have you seen him?” Repeat for a 12 hour shift, or until her sleeping meds finally kick in.
